title: Car Lease + Promotion - Mixed Timing
prompt: My take-home is $3800 per month, monthly expenses around $3100. Good news is I got a promotion starting in May that bumps me up to $4400 monthly. But I also signed a car lease that's $450/month for 6 months beginning in April. Oh, and there's a $1200 down payment I need to make when the lease starts. Starting February with $2500 cash, planning through August.
